mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.receiver AS "receiver", a.message_type AS "messageType", a.message_content AS "messageContent", a.message_status AS "messageStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_message( id, receiver, message_type, message_content, message_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{receiver}, #{messageType}, #{messageContent}, #{messageStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT message_content , message_status FROM `t_message` WHERE `receiver`=#{receiver} AND `message_type`=#{message_type}
